dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. North oriented toward right. Dedication to Gasparus Charles, seigneur of Baerledoncq, signed: Guilj. et Iohannes Blaeu. Latin text on verso with running title: Arragonia; p. 9; signature G. From: Theatrum orbis terrarum, sive, Atlas novus ... / editae a Guiljel. et Ioanne Blaeu. Amsterdami : Apud Iohannem et Cornelium Blaeu, 1640.
